name: Misplaced and Abandoned
description:
Story:

In a world of magic and mystery...
There is a place, shrouded by... Even more mystery... 
Hidden behind a waterfall, where no adventurer would ever consider looking...
A place so frightening, it makes ghosts shiver and gives skeletons goosebumps. 
A place known only as...

THE GOBLIN LOST AND FOUND DEPARTMENT 

Now to start your first day on the job!

Gameplay:
Inspired by premises of Papers Please and No Umbrellas Allowed, this game is a simple workplace comedy game about goblins running a Lost & Found department deep in the dungeons.

As you can imagine, getting an item from these shelves is much easier than grinding for thousands of hours, so be vary of sneaky characters trying to get away with more than is actually theirs.

Listen to them to figure out if they actually own the items they claim to be theirs.

And most importantly, have fun.

Cross-game promotion:
If you have a monster, a treasure or a hero from your own game, that you would like to feature inside our game, don't be afraid to reach out and we can add it.

A part of our challenge was creating the backend tech that allows us to add more characters and dialogue without changing the game client.

If you are interested, hit us up on discord : nilsmunch#2823

Production:
Made for the Nordic Game Jam 2022.  Everything you see is made from scratch in 44 hours. We are normally a larger team, but it was fun to run a smaller crew, even though it meant we didn't have a dedicated artist.

Our Theme was: Storage, Reunion and Waterfall
